Albuquerque.Frontier Restaurant:
Frontier Restaurant is a landmark New Mexican cuisine restaurant, located near the University of New Mexico, in the city of Albuquerque, New Mexico. The restaurant has a Western design, with artwork and images related to the American Southwest and The Duke throughout.


== History ==
The current location known as the Frontier Restaurant was the site of Chisum's Drugstore, which contained a popular soda fountain.
